description: Serve this delicious one pot curry with your favourite rice and homemade naan bread.
keywords: Indian curry,Soy free,Wheat free,Egg free,Tomato,Chicken,Sesame free,Dairy free,Potato
name: Chicken & Potato Curry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 clove garlic - chopped finely - more or less
1 knob small fresh ginger, peeled, chopped finely

recipeInstructions.text: Gather all ingredients together.Select a large non stick pot with a lid.
Heat oil in pot on high heat. Add chicken in two batches, browning on all sides for about 3-4 minutes each batch. Remove to a plate and set aside.
Add onion to same pot, turn heat down to medium. Sautee for about 3-4 minutes, add garlic and ginger and cook for a further couple of minutes or until onions have softened.
Add spices and curry powder and cook for a further minute or until fragrant.
Add tinned tomatoes (can use diced tomatoes if preferred) breaking up tomatoes, and mix well.
Add coconut cream and chicken stock, stirring well.
Return chicken back to the pot. Season with salt & pepper.
Add in prepared veggies, mix well. Put the lid on, and turn heat down to simmer. Simmer for 20 minutes.
At the 20 minute mark, remove lid and simmer for a further 20 minutes or until the sauce thickens. Do the taste test. Add more salt & pepper if required. Stir in parsley and serve.
I served with nutty brown rice and homemade naan bread on the side. Enjoy.
